name: BEWITCHED (no zalgo)
description:
This is an interactive fiction made in Twine 2.0, using the Harlowe 3.1.0 story format. In it, Eanflæd, a young mercian girl in the IX century, takes it upon herself to seek out the dreaded witch Black Brida and bargain for her little brother's life. I employed branching narrative technique and choices that modify available options for progression. Eanflæd may end up a different person from a playthrough to another.

In this version I removed some effects that might make it hard to read for some people.
